org.shared.util

Class IoBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.shared.util.IoBase

  • public class IoBase
extends Object
    A static utility class for I/O operations.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static int BULK_TRANSFER_SIZE
      The bulk transfer size for InputStreams and OutputStreams.
      protected static ThreadLocal<Map<String,String>> environmentLocal
      A mapping of environment variables local to the current thread in support of beginEnvironment() and endEnvironment().
      static InputStream nullInputStream
      A null InputStream that has nothing to read.
      static OutputStream nullOutputStream
      A null OutputStream to which writes have no effect.

      • delete

        public static final boolean delete(File f)
        Deletes a file or directory. If a directory, then recursively deletes the contents while not following symbolic links.
        Parameters:
        f - the file or directory.
        Returns:
        true if and only if the file or directory was deleted.

      • copy

        public static final boolean copy(File src,
           File dst)
        Copies a file or directory. If a directory, then recursively copies the contents while not following symbolic links.
        Parameters:
        src - the source file or directory.
        dst - the destination file or directory.
        Returns:
        true if and only if the copy operation went smoothly.

      • execAndWaitFor

        public static final int execAndWaitFor(InputStream parentIn,
                 OutputStream parentOut,
                 OutputStream parentError,
                 File workingDir,
                 String... execArgs)
                                throws IOException
        Forks and waits on a new Process.
        Parameters:
        parentIn - the InputStream that contains the child's input.
        parentOut - the OutputStream that receives the child's output.
        parentError - the OutputStream that receives the child's error output.
        workingDir - the working directory.
        execArgs - the command and arguments to execute.
        Returns:
        the return code of the child process.
        Throws:
        IOException - when something goes awry.
